short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension replaces alternate headlines with the primary headline on Australias ABC news

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Australia's ABC news has started putting headlines that err towards 'click-bait' in Top Stories and other locations. If you click on the article, the headline is different (and less click-bait)

This extension replaces the alternate click-bait headline with the one on the article
